rooms.name: Entrance Hall & Living Area
rooms.description: A welcoming space that adheres to Vastu principles by aligning with the main entrance and ensuring positive energy flow. Includes a reception area.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen design located in the southeast sector as per Vastu recommendations for prosperity and health.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom placed in the northwest direction to ensure calmness and positive energy. Adjacent to a walk-in closet.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom 1
rooms.description: Guest room with ample storage space, ensuring privacy and adhering to Vastu guidelines by placement in the south-west corner.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Additional guest bedroom following similar design principles to Guest Bedroom 1.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Modern bathroom with proper ventilation and lighting. Placed near the master bedroom for convenience.

rooms.name: Servants Quarters
rooms.description: Quarters allocated for household staff to ensure privacy while maintaining close proximity for service efficiency.

rooms.name: Private Gym
rooms.description: Dedicated gym space designed with ample clearance and ventilation. Placed in the east sector as per Vastu to encourage health and energy.

rooms.name: Home Theater
rooms.description: A dedicated home theater area incorporating acoustic design considerations. Positioned in a quiet corner of the ground floor for optimal viewing experience.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: Large main entrance door ensuring easy access and aligned with Vastu principles.

openings.name: Service Entrance
openings.description: Secondary entrance for staff and utilities.

openings.name: Emergency Exit
openings.description: Safety exit in compliance with local building codes.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: A serene master bedroom on the first floor with a private balcony and view. Designed in accordance with Vastu to promote relaxation.

rooms.name: Bathroom (First Floor)
rooms.description: Additional bathroom serving the upper level for convenience.

rooms.name: Study/Library
rooms.description: A quiet study area with ample natural light positioned to enhance creativity and calmness.

rooms.name: Additional Bedroom
rooms.description: Extra bedroom ensuring privacy and comfort for family members or guests.

rooms.name: Servants Quarters (Upper)
rooms.description: Additional quarters on the first floor to accommodate more staff if needed, designed with privacy and practicality in mind.

openings.name: Staircase
openings.description: Main staircase connecting ground floor to first floor, centrally located for easy access.

openings.name: Fire Escape
openings.description: Compliant fire escape route as per safety standards and local building norms.
